name: It's Time To Rest
description:
A man is camping in a beautiful forest, spending his evenings trying to cooking good food for the altar. Finding what a love or not.

It's Time to Rest has no real purpose, just enjoy the atmosphere, cook, and rest, without having any real difficulty

  • Controls:

-Keyboard: ZSQD: movement | SpaceBar: interact

-Gamepad: left joystick: movement | A: interact

  • Credits:

Game made during a GameJam
